lines.text: It's just the dragon exit. That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just have to remember which one goes to the drag-- here, take the map! Who's going in? I've got the map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going in? Where are you going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you guys are just going to fucking make out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need at least one magic person to charge those glyphs in the dragon exit room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be days in there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to open up the fucking ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you're not out in one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it's one day for us, is it like a week for them? Or is it the opposite?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it, Matt? Will you explain that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The time dilation, time goes by quicker when you're inside the sphere than it does outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if it's a day outside, how long is it inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be many, many days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So can bring them back in 30 minutes, and maybe that's a whole day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the inside, it could be many more days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Long time passes on the outside, while less time passes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you left and everyone's like, you've been gone for two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's the reverse of what I'm thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, then I'm useless in there because I've got no spells, I shouldn't go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So then we can't do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could just, teleport and scatter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So in theory, you could get a short rest, or a long rest in the inside of the sphere, for an hour outside of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you were inside, I don't think you would miss what's going on outside because we could bamf you out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the opposite of what you're saying, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If an hour goes by outside, how many hours go by inside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So a long rest inside the ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, time is going faster inside the ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why Halas basically wanted to skip through history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a period of time, if he wanted to keep it in that forward momentum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So whoever goes in is not going to be able to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you take a long rest in the ball, it'll be days outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she was like, you were gone for a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it depends on how quickly the people on the inside can make their way to the exit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many spells do we need to activate the dragon room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you can go into the ball, and beeline for the exit--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That means that a day or so will pass for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just used Eldritch Blast on both of them, and they charged up and it fed to the middle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should go, Fjord, you remember how to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then you guys are going to go to fuck-all and rest for a day?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got the map. I'll go in with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're taking the family members?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do not take my son into that ball!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better hope the ball isn't as bad as wherever we're going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's been opening the ball the whole fucking time this whole conversation is happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's you three and four, right? Jester, Fjord, Beau, and Yasha going in? Is that it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Only two need to go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear, "Excuse me! I'm sorry. You have to go! You can't come in here!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm retracing my steps with the operation of the ball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then, I guess we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you would have advantage on this, because you had done this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guiding me? Well, if I'm allowed the Guidance, the highest roll will be 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for those who are not going into the sphere, you would know as he's doing this to step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, step-- whoever-- it's a radius around the sphere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I toss it to Fjord and say: Turn that dial on the end and then press in on the bottom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Open the door. Open the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the ball, I'm holding onto the ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use the scroll instantaneously to open the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a six-second casting time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can steal a few things from the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there is a sudden flash, and everyone who was in the proximity of Fjord, who had chosen to go into the sphere, are gone and the ball just-- (clanging) onto the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are currently going through the scroll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And-- (whooshing) All of you feel yourselves being pulled from this reality, as her hand goes limp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, because that's a fun cutting point, I'll go ahead and leave it there for tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll figure it out live. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, good to figure it out as we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's better to find out live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was like, I could keep going, but I think we're right around the three-hour mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I think it's a fun beat to pick up on next time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! My back is hurting from clenching.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've been ran our butts off today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So intense from start to finish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope we don't lose three members of the party to the astral plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see how it pans out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, not to get too in the weeds about that time-passage thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wanted to make sure we weren't going to get fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was entirely out of story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Anyway, we got there eventually and that's what matters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (stoner voice) If you think about it, is time even real?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just like this golem over here that's about to eat our face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you guys just book towards the exit now, and it should be more or less fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a lot I didn't get to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So to clarify, to clarify the notes here so we have it, who went into the happy fun ball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Child and mother and Yeza in tow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
